title: Shu Qi - Dreaming Naked Show
overview: This unique forty-minute montage features the lovely Shu Qi exhibiting her heavenly form in various settings. The first shoot takes place seaside, where she poses nude and seminude. In the next segment she models outdoors in lingerie. Cut to a bathroom, in which she strips, showers, and then bathes. She poses in lingerie some more and in a bedroom lies nude on a bed. The final sequence occurs on a catwalk, where she and other models strut their stuff in scanty undergarments. A mixed soundtrack plays all the while, from start to finish.
